thread.title: Screenwriter Dustin Lance Black, British Olympian engaged
thread.title_full: Screenwriter Dustin Lance Black, British Olympian engaged

title: Screenwriter Dustin Lance Black, British Olympian engaged
text: > Entertainment Screenwriter Dustin Lance Black, British Olympian engaged FILE - This is a Monday, Sept. 28, 2015 file photo of British Olympic diver Tom Daley and Oscar-winning screenwriter Dustin Lance Black, right as they pose for photographers upon arrival at the Pride of Britain Awards 2015 in London. Tom Daley and Dustin Lance Black have announced their engagement. The announcement was published in The Times newspaper Thursday Oct. 1, 2015 but did not disclose a date for the marriage. (Photo by Joel Ryan/Invision/AP, File)
